replies.body:
"
We have the technology.

WAIT FOR IT Added a spinning icon in the lower right-hand corner of the loading screen. If it stops moving, that means something went wrong."


YESSSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

People praise and keep suggesting that like it is some godsend but I believe that when you get stuck on loading screen it does not actually freeze, it just gets stuck in a loop and never receives the OK-signal from the game server that everyone loaded, and since it is stuck in a loop the animation would most likely keep looping too, not just randomly stopping

thatis unless they somehow have a deadman switch that keeps sending updates to the loading client to keep the icon spinning and the updates stop sending as soon as the game starts

I really doubt this will solve any issues that are not caused by like faulty graphics drivers etc
Actually for me the problem is that it freezes and crashes and i can't tell

> [{quoted}](name=Vipture,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=l7gHAddd,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-10-18T21:02:13.795+0000)
>
> Actually for me the problem is that it freezes and crashes and i can't tell

Are you sure? There is not really any way to tell the difference.
There is now{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Finally!  I was getting tired of sitting for 2 minutes then alt-tabbing to discover the client had crashed....again
To some this might not seem like a big deal, but it truly is.
Yeah, I've only lost a few ranked games to this over the years, but it's the absolute dumbest (most frustrating) reason I can think of to lose a game.
Great Idea!!

I recall [Gentleman Gustaf](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/p4wnKs9E-patch-620-notes?comment=002b) mentioning that this patch would have the scoreboard be automatically ordered according by role but I see no mention of it in the patch notes.

Has it been delayed?
---------------------
Edit:  Thank you, VritraReiRei.

[It has been delayed.](https://dd.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/585alm/patch_621_notes/d8xnjxw)

http://data.whicdn.com/images/77331618/large.gif
asking the important questions!

I like to think I have my priorities in order.

I only wish my scoreboard were the same.
Of all the updates, this was the one I was anticipating the most. Then it disappeared overnight without a word...

Why are you hoping for that? I order it myself when I spawn in. Just like warding, it's one more small thing you can do to give yourself an edge over your opponent. why do you want it to happen automatically? Especially if you're already cognizant of it? What if they order it in a way you don't like? What if they put the Support and Jungler on the top? What if they don't and you WANT that?

They already stated that the order was going to be:

* Top
* Jungle
* Mid
* Bot
* Support
It's automatically ordered like that for worlds, so why not for everyone?
It's not automatically done either, it's ordered by players not by roles (IMay game where Athena played Lee Sin and Avoidless was supp)

short answer, YES.

[link to reddit comment](https://dd.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/585alm/patch_621_notes/d8xnjxw)

And cuuuuuute
No mention of Kalista. Weird.
I have mained Zac for over a year.  I really hope this nerf doesn't ruin him completely.  Thanks Riot for screwing up my favorite champion.
nerf?
0.75 sec is such a long time ...
I want spectate mode to track dragons like when watching the pros... is that too much to ask?
Will we get a personalised shop with Harrowing?

One of the main joys of patch notes is the small references
Let's see you grit those teeth with {{champion:104}} may be nothing, but given the writer and the exact wording, these are the patch notes that will pierce the heavens
Or maybe I'm just over analyzing and overly sensitive to something I love.
Is this patch live? I want to play a game of {{champion:75}}
Patch notes always release on Tuesdays, but the patches that go along with them always release on Wednesdays.
BUT WHEN WILL WE GET DUNKMASTER {{champion:420}} ?!?!?!?!?

Please return Kog'maw's mana cost on w back to 0 (as it was before the rework). Riot basically said they would return him to the old kogmaw, but then they kept his bad ult and kept the w mana cost. Now you have (kind of?) fixed the ult. Time for the W.
#MakeKogmawGreatAgain
Satan Teemo skin for the win!
Will the previous Harrowing skins return for a limited time like last year with this patch?
yes
{{summoner:14}} {{champion:17}} {{summoner:14}} The devil has come
Is it just me, or is this a really minor patch?
"It’s a pretty small patch overall" They themselves said it was a small patch in the intro.
WTF is approaching 40% health

That means at 100% health, it will do the lowest damage value, and it will do more damage up to the "approaching 40% health" value if the target has lower than 100% health but more than 40%.  

So rather than just doing A damage if they are above 40% and Z damage below it will do B C D E..X Y damage based on exactly how much health they have.

It's like how veigar ulti works, where it does max damage if the target has 20% HP or less, and minimum if the target is full hp, but in between ~~it does a gradient of values based on the targets health~~ just kills you.

It wasnt worded like that but thanks. it was worded like it would be doing  A damage in the apporaching 40% zone and B damage in the less than 40% zone so i wanted to know where this apporaching 40% zone started. idk why they didnt just say based on missing health up to 40%
Exactly, they worded it in a confusing way.

I think you forgot to include that veigar ult just kills you if you're around 50% HP.

That champion is just a headache.
WHY NOT PINK CHROMA DARIUS!!!!!
As one of the most-played games of all time... here's one more vote for an official Linux client. :/

Has anyone else had issues with Relic Shield's passive not working on Thresh lately? Me and several other friends have all had the same issue with not being able to execute minions and give our ADC gold for it

Thresh is a ranged support and therefore doesnt get the minion smite bonus that melee supports (braum, alistar, blitz, etc.) get from the item. On Thresh specifically though it comes down to your ability to last hit as well as balance the stacking of your flay passive between last hitting and harassing the enemies.
I don't think the execute has ever worked for thresh, you have to actually last hit with him because he's considered to be ranged.
